channel.title: Project SystemScape
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i230.photobucket.com/albums/ee11/Newsystem/cooltext67348430.jpg[/img]
[b]Welcome to SystemScape Development Team's :) ![/b]
[b]Thing's That Will Be on Server : [/b]
[ul][li]Full Woodcutting[/li] [li]98% Fire making[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]98% Special attacks[/li] [li]New Item's (Updated)[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]58% Constitution [/li] [li]80% Full NPC's[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]70% Fishing[/li] [li]60% Training Easy[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]There will be a lot more :) ![/li][/ul]
[b]Spot's that May be taken :[/b]
[ul][li]Forum Maker - Will Get Reward[/li] [li]Forum Coder - Will Also get a Reward[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Server Coder (Helper)[/li] [li]Server Tester[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Idea Maker[/li] [li]Update Person (tells if theres a update)[/li][/ul]
Remember to stay Active on forums coming soon or your job will be lost :( !
[b]Code to Apply :[/b] [code] Name : Job Wanted : MSN E-mail (Wont Be Useing a Lot) : Prove that you will do good : Prove that you will stay active on forums : Your Coding Status in your job :[/code]
[b]Got the Job or Don't Got the Job :[/b]
Thanks For Doing that Job
Sorry you Don't get the job
Thanks ;D

MSN E-mail : ninjanoob@hotmail.com
